author: jsalvata
msg: * Use tabbed pannels instead of adjacent ones to present
the different views of the result.
* Prevent attempting to show excessively large texts -- it's
too costly both in time and in memory.

author: jsalvata
msg: Have the component's GUIs change (be rebuilt) when user
Incidentally, this fixes an anoying (but harmless) NPE.
